examples: Things like this take time.
Time is moving on.
The time passed quickly.
Time to bust a move.
The contractor is really taking their time.
words.defineEn: the quantity that is measured in seconds, minutes, hours, etc. using a device like clock
words.defineVi: số lượng được đo bằng giây, phút, giờ, v.v. bằng thiết bị như đồng hồ

examples: Today is Monday.
The lawyers put another nail in her coffin today.
The euro hit a record low in trading today.
I saw a famous actress at the shopping mall today.
All winter coats are half-price today.
words.defineEn: the day that is taking place right now
words.defineVi: ngày đang diễn ra ngay bây giờ

examples: Maybe this photograph will jog your memory.
This book bridges a gulf between the metaphysics literature and philosophy of mind literature.
Does this pub do lunches?
This skirt has a stretchy waistband for comfort.
This room gets very little sunshine.
words.defineEn: used when referring to a person or thing that was recently mentioned or one that is close in space or time
words.defineVi: được sử dụng khi đề cập đến một người hoặc một vật được đề cập gần đây hoặc một người gần gũi về không gian hoặc thời gian

examples: Morning brought no relief from the heat.
The morning is a time of new beginnings and possibilities.
My mother waters the plants in our garden every morning.
I had a letter from my brother this morning.
I got a call from Dave this morning.
words.defineEn: the time of day that is between when the sun starts to rise and the middle of the day at twelve o'clock
words.defineVi: thời gian trong ngày là giữa khi mặt trời bắt đầu mọc và giữa ngày lúc mười hai giờ

examples: The afternoon is a popular time for outdoor activities like picnics and sports.
The afternoon sun casts a warm glow on the buildings and trees.
We have a university lecture on art history this afternoon.
The weather turned quite chilly in the afternoon.
We had the run of the house for the afternoon.
words.defineEn: the time of day that is between twelve o'clock and the time that the sun starts to set
words.defineVi: thời gian trong ngày là giữa mười hai giờ và thời gian mà mặt trời bắt đầu lặn

words.defineEn: during the night of the present day
words.defineVi: trong đêm của ngày hôm nay

examples: This young team is taking the veteran squad to the cleaners tonight.
The store will close at 9 p.m. tonight.
Tonight we have a delicious tofu stir-fry with fresh vegetables and a flavorful sauce.
The news won't be on tonight.
The restaurant reservation is for 8 o'clock tonight.
words.defineEn: the night or evening of the current day
words.defineVi: đêm hoặc tối của ngày hiện tại

examples: Give me a call tomorrow.
They're busting a move tomorrow.
We have to learn one of Hamlet's speeches for school tomorrow.
The charges against the suspect will come up in court tomorrow.
The President hits town tomorrow.
words.defineEn: the day that will come after today ends
words.defineVi: ngày sẽ đến sau ngày hôm nay kết thúc

examples: The days passed slowly.
The day brings a sense of vitality and liveliness to the world.
The news really made my day.
The hotel provides fresh towels for the guests every day.
Our car has seen better days!
words.defineEn: a period of time that is made up of twenty-four hours
words.defineVi: một khoảng thời gian được tạo thành từ hai mươi bốn giờ

examples: Next add the flour.
The school semester starts next month.
Next year sees the centenary of Saint-Saëns' death.
The theatre company has several new productions in the pipeline for next season.
Our next class will take the form of a debate.
words.defineEn: coming immediately after a person or thing in time, place, or rank
words.defineVi: đến ngay sau một người hoặc vật trong thời gian, địa điểm, hoặc thứ hạng

examples: Today is Monday.
I'm going monk mode from Monday.
Jessica died Monday.
I have a team meeting every Monday afternoon.
After a fun weekend I was back in harness on Monday, handling paperwork at my desk.
words.defineEn: ‌the day that takes place after Sunday
